description: This header file provides function declarations and descriptions for handling device URIs and resource operations within a device service context. It includes functions for creating URIs, reading and writing resources and metadata, and extracting identifiers from URIs, mainly to support device management operations in the system.

methods.name: createDeviceUri
methods.description: Creates a URI to a device given its UUID.

methods.name: createEndpointUri
methods.description: Creates a URI to an endpoint on a device specified by device UUID and endpoint ID.

methods.name: createDeviceResourceUri
methods.description: Creates a URI to a specific resource on a device.

methods.name: createDeviceMetadataUri
methods.description: Creates a URI to metadata associated with a device.

methods.name: createEndpointResourceUri
methods.description: Creates a URI to a resource on a specific device endpoint.

methods.name: createEndpointMetadataUri
methods.description: Creates a URI to metadata associated with a device endpoint.

methods.name: deviceHelperReadEndpointResource
methods.description: Reads the value of a resource on a device's endpoint.

methods.name: deviceHelperWriteEndpointResource
methods.description: Writes a value to a resource on a device's endpoint.

methods.name: deviceHelperReadDeviceResource
methods.description: Reads a resource value from a device.

methods.name: deviceHelperGetResourceByUri
methods.description: Retrieves a resource object given its URI.

methods.name: deviceHelperReadResourceByUri
methods.description: Reads resource value directly using the resource URI.

methods.name: deviceHelperReadMetadataByUri
methods.description: Reads metadata value using its URI.

methods.name: deviceHelperWriteMetadataByUri
methods.description: Writes metadata value using its URI.

methods.name: deviceHelperReadMetadataByOwner
methods.description: Reads metadata associated with an owner URI and metadata ID.

methods.name: deviceHelperWriteMetadataByOwner
methods.description: Writes metadata associated with an owner URI and metadata ID.

methods.name: createResourceUri
methods.description: Creates a URI to a resource, either on a device or endpoint, given owner URI and resource ID.

methods.name: getDeviceUuidFromUri
methods.description: Extracts the device UUID from a given URI.

methods.name: getEndpointIdFromUri
methods.description: Extracts the endpoint ID from a given URI.

methods.name: deviceHelperGetDeviceResourceValue
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a resource from a device, returning default if unavailable.

methods.name: deviceHelperGetEndpointResourceValue
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a resource from a specific endpoint.

methods.name: deviceHelperGetEndpointByProfile
methods.description: Finds the first endpoint on a device that matches a given profile.

methods.name: deviceHelperIsMultiEndpointCapable
methods.description: Determines if a device supports multiple endpoints.
